scripts.LIB-TO-NPM-PATCH: npm run _delete-declaration-minify && npm run _version-patch && npm run _copy-publish
scripts.LIB-TO-NPM-MINOR: npm run _delete-declaration-minify && npm run _version-minor && npm run _copy-publish
scripts.LIB-TO-NPM-MAJOR: npm run _delete-declaration-minify && npm run _version-major && npm run _copy-publish
scripts._delete: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true });"
scripts._copy: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const data = fs.readFileSync('package.json'); fs.writeFileSync('dist/package.json', data);"
